```{python}
def allocate_portfolio(asset_prices):
    
    # This simple strategy equally weights all assets every period
    # (called a 1/n strategy).
    
    n_assets = len(asset_prices)
    weights = np.repeat(1 / n_assets, n_assets)
    return weights
```
